name: Alien Infiltration
overview: A selective answers adventure by Cheryl de Boissiere and published in Loadstar #174 in 1998. You play the game as Lea Lison, crack investigative reporter for a major news magazine - Worldwind Weekly News. You are home, investigating the joys of microwave popcorn and old movies, when the phone rings. It is Ken Tolsen, Hustler, currently your best street source. You won't believe what I hooked into this time! You better come and see me. I'm at the Walt Raleigh, room 264. People are buying up TOXIC WASTE! Reports indicate they may be aliens. You had better investigate!
